## Ingredients

### Wet

* 1 egg
* 1/4 cup cooking oil
* 1/2 cup milk
* 1 cup mashed banana (2 bananas)

### Dry

* 1 3/4 cups flour
* 1/2 cup white sugar
* 2 tsp baking powder
* 1/2 tsp salt

* 1/2 cup chocolate chips


## Directions

* Preheat oven to 400F.
* Grease or line a regular sized muffin tin.
* Mix [wet](#wet) ingredients in a large bowl.
* Mix [dry](#dry) ingredients in a smaller bowl.
* Pour dry ingredients into wet, mix until just combined, add **1/2 cup** chocolate chips.
* Scoop mix into 12 cup muffin tin.
* Bake at **400F** for 20 - 25 minutes. Tops should spring back when pressed, toothpick should come out clean.

Source: Connie Finnigan.
